item.title: Mermaid notes
item.description: shapes graph LR id1[方框] id2(帶有圓角的方框) id3([體育場形狀]) id4[[子例程]] id5[(圓柱狀)] id6((圓形)) id7>非對稱形狀] id8{菱形} id9{{六角形}} id10[/平行四邊形1/] id11[\平行四邊形 2\] id12[/梯形 1\] id13[\梯形 2/] id14(((雙圓))) link graph LR A B A |text| B C –> D C –>|text| D E -.- F E -.-|text| F G -.-> H G -.->|text| H I === J I ===|text| J K ~~~ L K ~~~|text| L ```mermaid flowchart LR A --o B B --x C D o--o E E <--> F F x--x G subgraphs flowchart TD c1-->a2 subgraph one a1-->a2 end subgraph "`**two**`" b1-->b2 end subgraph three c1-->c2 end
